usesDebitCard.question: Do you use a debit card?
numberOfCards.question: How many cards do you carry in your wallet?
hasStoreBrandCard.question: Do you have store brand card or major credit card?
numberOfTransactions.question: How many times a week do you use a credit debit card?
averageTransactionAmount.question: What would you estimate is the average dollar amount of each transaction on your card? $10 or less, more than $10 but less than $50
incentives.question: What incentives are offered by your debit card?
incentives.answer.2: Fee-less withdrawals from any ATM across the world
advantages.question: What are the advantages of using one?
advantages.answer.0: No need for cash to bulk up your wallet
advantages.answer.1: The ability to purchase items online
advantages.answer.2: In some cases, can be used as a form of identity verification
advantages.answer.3: Easier way to track your spending; this leads to improved security as your bank will notify you if your spending habits suddenly change, for example, when your card is stolen
disadvantages.question: What are the disadvantages?
disadvantages.answer.0: Since you don't need cash, a lot of the time you don't carry it around
disadvantages.answer.1: If your card gets stolen, it's easy to lose a lot of money if you don't have a low limit imposed
